titles.title: CB 138 Thou Hast Turned my mourning

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Thou hast turned my mourning into dancing for me
Thou hast put off my sack cloth
Thou hast turned my mourning into dancing for me
And girded me with gladness
To the end my glory may sing praise unto Thee
And not be silent
Oh Lord my God I will give thanks unto Thee forever
